author: dan131riley
body: Change MixingModule base class from edm::one::EDProducer to edm::stream::EDProducer.  This includes making the MixingModule base class and derived classes thread safe, adds stream interfaces to the PileUp and SecondaryEventProvider, plus mechanical changes to the interfaces of many of the associated producers.  Most of the changes outside of Mixing/Base are simple type changes.
title: Mixing module multithreading
